metadata.Plot: Bernie Goldsmith, a long-time civilian employee of the U.S. Navy is suspended as a security risk when investigators discover he had communist affiliations in his youth. Snubbed by former friends and harassed by others in the community, Goldsmith hires a lawyer to fight the charges and clear his good name.
metadata.Actors: Ray Milland, Ernest Borgnine, Frank Lovejoy
